gui

Class StartScreenBackground

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • gui.StartScreenBackground
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class StartScreenBackground
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener
    The Class StartScreenBackground is used to create a new background image and to handle with the events on the first game frame
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
